DEAN COSTON WINS
ENGINEERING GRANT
Dean W. Coston, former city councilman and senior studio engineer
at the University Broadcasting Service, has been named one of the
winners of the 19^6 Radio and Audio Engineering Grants.
The grants are sponsored by the National Association of Educational
Broadcasters.
Under the grant, C0ston will attend a week-long engineering seminar
at the University of Illinois to examine problems of the NAEB*s nationÂ¬
wide network of educational radio stations.
